Package prkmodel.types

Interface Astrocyte

All Superinterfaces:
NervousSystemElement
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultAstrocyte, RepastAstrocyte
public interface Astrocyte extends NervousSystemElement
Interface representing an astrocyte in the nervous system. An astrocyte is a type of glial cell in the nervous system that provides support and protection for neurons, as well as targeting cytokines.

It extends the NervousSystemElement interface to include astrocyte-specific behaviors and properties.

Since:
2024-07-03
Version:
1.0
Author:
Samuele95

  • Method Details

    • getMitochondriaTransferCount

      int getMitochondriaTransferCount()
      Retrieves the number of mitochondria transfers this astrocyte has performed.
      Returns:
      the number of mitochondria transfers.

    • activate

      void activate()
      Activates the astrocyte, enabling its functionalities such as neuron support and mitochondria transfer.

    • deactivate

      void deactivate()
      Deactivates the astrocyte, disabling its functionalities.

    • isActive

      boolean isActive()
      Checks if the astrocyte is active.
      Returns:
      true if the astrocyte is active, false otherwise.

    • transferMitochondria

      void transferMitochondria(Neuron neuronNeedingMitochondria)
      Transfers mitochondria to a specified neuron in need.

      Mitochondria transfer is essential for maintaining neuronal health and function, particularly in neurons that are under stress or have impaired mitochondria.

      Parameters:
      neuronNeedingMitochondria - the neuron needing mitochondria.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the neuronNeedingMitochondria is null.
      See Also:
      • Neuron

    • supportNeurons

      void supportNeurons()
      Provides support to neurons, potentially influencing their state or behavior.

      This may include functions such as maintaining the extracellular ion balance, supplying nutrients, and modulating synaptic activity.
